restaurant.name: Pizza Hut
restaurant.description: Pizza Hut is an American restaurant chain and international franchise known for Italian-American cuisine including pizza and pasta as well as side dishes and desserts.

restaurant.name: Olive Garden
restaurant.description: Olive Garden, famed for their modern-day Italian dishes, has finally arrived in Malaysia. Their traditional Italian specialties, made with only the freshest ingredients, are perfect for sharing with your loved ones. Indulge in a creamy bowl of fettucine alfredo, chow down on some hearty minestrone, or wash down your meal with a slice on heavenly tiramisu. Embark on your very own Italian food journey here at Olive Garden.
